title: Families
description: The family, as an institution, is in serious trouble. Divorce, parental neglect, abuse, and "alternative lifestyles" have all contributed to the dissolution not only of family ties but of the values that are the foundation of successful home and family life.... Now, in "Families," twenty General Authorities and general officers of the auxiliaries of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints explain how to create and nurture homes that are truly a refuge from the evils of the world. Concerned parents will appreciate the counself on dealing with challenges to teaching the gospel in the home. Childless couples, widowed persons, single parents, and those who are caring for elderly family members will likewise find counsel to strengthen them.... Filled with encouragement and heartwarming stories and examples, "Families" sustains the doctrine of the Church and speaks in a relevant way to strengthen every family.
author: Howard W. Hunter
